Topic.Title: My code has disappeared, but the game is still there? Please help me recover the code!

Posts.EditableText:
I made a short game, published it as unlisted a few weeks ago.

Now I go to edit my game and I find that everything has been completely erased!

Yet if I click on "published games" I can still play it!

Is there a way to recover my game code from the published version?
Posts.HTML:
I made a short game, published it as unlisted a few weeks ago.

Now I go to edit my game and I find that everything has been completely erased!

Yet if I click on "published games" I can still play it!

Is there a way to recover my game code from the published version?

Posts.EditableText: I tried "view source code" while actually playing the game, but that doesn't work.
Posts.HTML: I tried "view source code" while actually playing the game, but that doesn't work.

Posts.EditableText: I had the same problem, but the code just re-appeared after a week!
Posts.HTML: I had the same problem, but the code just re-appeared after a week!
